name: Best Baconless Spinach Salad Dressing
author: Applekrisp
summary: My daughter is vegetarian so I came up with this alternative to hot bacon dressing for spinach salad. This is great if there are vegetarians at your table. I serve crumbled bacon on the side so we still get the delicious flavor of hot bacon dressing! You can substitute Dijon mustard for the honey Dijon mustard, if desired.
ingredients: ⅓ cup white sugar, or more to taste
directions: Whisk olive oil, white wine vinegar, Dijon mustard, red onion, sea salt, black pepper, and lemon juice together in a microwave-safe bowl
Cook oil mixture in the microwave until hot and almost boiling, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes
Gradually whisk sugar into hot mixture until dressing is thick and creamy
